#summary hasOne(foreignKey,class,name)

#labels api,init

*Description*: Sets up a 'has one' association between this class and the specified one

*Return Type*: void

|| *Arguments* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *foreignKey* || string || false ||  || Foreign key property name ||
|| *class* || string || false ||  || Name of associated class ||
|| *name* || string || true ||  || Name of the association ||
